string-array.name: Tips
string-array.item: Plastic bottle caps are usually recyclable along with the bottle! Check with your local solid waste and recycling office to be sure, but many recycling programs accept bottle caps.

Half is better than none! Although you can’t recycle your whole pizza box, you can tear off and recycle the top half, as long as it’s grease-free. As always, check with your local solid waste and recycling office to be sure. Keep this tip in mind if you’re picking up a pizza or ordering in this weekend!
Reduce and reuse first to shrink your environmental footprint! Reduce your unwanted mail by unsubscribing via CatalogChoice.org
